title: Expected Attendees at Tonight's State Dinner | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the First Lady


For Immediate Release
June 07, 2011

 



Expected Attendees at Tonight's State Dinner





	Below is a list of expected attendees at tonight’s State Dinner. Attached are details about the State Dinner, also available here: http://obamawhitehouse.archives.gov/sites/default/files/uploads/germany_state_visit.pdf.
